name: Path 2 Promotion
description:
This is a career-simulation boardgame in Chinese. which is still under development, but playable on PC.

Our intention is to inspire college graduates about how to get their first promotion while experimenting combination/sequence of different skills to minimize time to finish the game.

Instrcution 

(Imagine you are a rookie employee) want to get to "promoted", players roll a 3-sided dice to progress from step 1 to 45 using as few # of dice rolls as possible.  Players would enter 5-step roguelike Maze and encounter other types events. Passing the final committee, players must have all 3 skills (otherwise sent back to grinding Period).

** enter & exit maze must have more than enough points of dice, and points don't carry over. 

Skills: 

Player should choose 1 skill at the start of the game, and acquire one new skill each time after grinding period, different skill equip players with ability/effect

  1. People Skill: required to trigger support event (to be teleported)
  2. Technical Skill: #of rolls+1 ( but "setback' punishment +1)
  3. Resilience/Luck: immune to all the setbacks and backstab events

We welcome any critics, feedback, and comments thus create this link for public playtest.
